replies.body:
I like reading the update notes because of all the cynical comments in the update.

{{item:3071}}  TOTAL COST 3000 gold (unchanged). In case you couldn't do the math. 

{{item:3104}}  DON'T YOU WORRY CHILD Unchanged. Just in case you were concerned we were going to bring it line with Infinity Edge. Nope.

Lmao I have played since season 1 and this is the stupidest patch I have ever seen. The huge nerf on ryze and jinx? The change of black cleaver in to a health item, A TANK ITEM THAT SHREDS? The buff to botrk to make it more viable early when it was fine? Righteous Glory nerf which is already a risk to build? Righteous Glory is not a problem, it's the champions building them and cinderhulk lmao. The biggest load of unnecessary trash I have ever seen because a huge company still doesn't know what to do about the tank meta.

... Have you even played ryze on the PBE, yes he is much weaker without his passive and it is difficult to stack early, but late game, it is on the verge of being broken, and he was always meant to be a late game tanky mage.

Jinx needed the nerf to her ult, it is mean to be a long range snipe, not a shotgun to the face, and it was stupid in the early game, when you are about to first blood her when she ult kills you you from 1/3ish health.

The tank item that shreds, black cleaver, is not really an item for tanks, it is something that a  bruiser would build, think rek'sai or vi or panth, considering it only gives 400 health (which I admit is a pretty decent amount), but it gives no resistances at all.  Late game, 400 health with no extra resistances will mean it will take an extra 0.3 seconds to melt you.

So please, don't talk about crap that you don't really understand.

"Jinx needed the nerf to her ult, it is mean to be a long range snipe, not a shotgun to the face, and it was stupid in the early game, when you are about to first blood her when she ult kills you you from 1/3ish health."

Serious question i want to ask, how do you take this point blank ult?

Legitmately the point blank ult's are the easiest ones to dodge, cause it already has a massive cast time associated with it, not to mention, i think people misunderstand how short the maximum range is.

How is a point blank ult the easiest to dodge??? and also... "people misunderstand how short the maximum range is", it's a global ult. legit the greatest maximum rang you can get... you ok in the head there?

The Maximum range i'm implying for those that are slow thinkers is the maximum damage range, but keep pretending your smart.

The maximum damage range for the ult, is 1500 btw, which isn't all that far.

Not to mention, unless she hides in a bush point blank from you, you always knows what direction she is casting it, and the cast time gives enough time to get out the way.

What you can't do is dodge the thing when you don't realize it's coming.
I believe he has confused her Zap thing (or whatever it's called) with her ult.
Rito have officially killed ARAM...
agree! legend of the poro king was fun as one of the temporary maps, putting in the feature permanently just destroys the fresh feeling and it's annoying as hell
DOWN WITH Mark / dash, FOR THE {{summoner:31}} , oh, and the Frelijord but, who cares, {{summoner:31}} .
that is the best mundo pic ever

Riot: Zhu-Li! Do the thing!
Zhu-li; {{champion:13}} updated, sir.
Riot: Zhu-Li, do the thing.
Zhu-Li;{{champion:222}} ult nerfed, sir.
Riot: Alright, do the other thing!
Zhu-Li; Yessir. {{item:3071}} updated sir.
Riot: What's next? Oh yea, Zhu-Li! Do the thing!
Zhu-Li; New skins for everyone BUT {{champion:154}}? Really sir?
IDGAF I'M STILL THE BEST EARTHBENDER EVEN KUVIRA COULDN'T NERF ME
Uh just as a side note, you guys re-used Caitlyn's{{champion:51}}  champion portrait for Dr. Mundo... xD

Shouldve been {{item:3134}} + {{item:3044}} = {{item:3071}} 
wouldn't that have made sense?
with the new change to the black cleaver build up, it gets armor penetration stacks out of nowhere... and to add the {{item:3067}} for the cooldown reduction? the brutalizer already has cooldown so I don't really see the point in this item change. 
It really puts champions such as {{champion:92}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} at a disadvantage since it was pretty much their core build up item to go into a major core. To build phage for these champions would be too costly and inefficient in their gaming phases. The only champion that may really benefit from this item change is {{champion:64}} who benefits from the build up item and the final core. 
I believe that riot's aim was to make black cleaver more accessable for AD-carrys to use which would be to have another build up item for phage. However to brutalizer of one of its core I think is a change not intended for. It makes no sense from the build up items to the final core for the new black cleaver to have armor penetration what so ever. 
Personal opinion which i think is most rational in item explanation and to achieve both (what i think is) riot's intention for allowing ADC to go for black cleaver as well as the majority of melee AD champions to use as well would be for this build up.
{{item:3134}} + {{item:3044}} ={{item:3071}} 
1337 + 1325 + recipe (348) = 3000 
Any thoughts? Maybe a strong response will allow a change towards the player preference.
I main Top and I totally agree with you that brutalizer being a core item for most of the champs I play.
{{champion:86}} can have {{item:3083}} in aram ??! gg lol
LOL the health regen will be even more ridiculous!

RIP Jinx
she already had problem early laning phase but now she can't even execute champs in the lane anymore with that ridiculous rocket damage. it doesn't even have the damage of an AA.

She has very little issues with early laning phase though? Insane poke with W or great range + damage with Q. Easy follow up to an engage by support with E. And her ultimate is not a shotgun. Or an autoattack. Don't use it as an auto attack. And it only takes 1 second to get to full damage. Plus it still has the execute just in case.

Jinx's strength is her range. Her weakness is and should remain having enemies on top of her. That's why her abilities have cast times. Her Q AS takes time to stack. Her ult did not fit that at all. Until now. Use the ult the way it is meant to be used. You do know how to use a skill shot, right?
THE JINX ULT NERF WHAT THE HELL!!!
Dude it was coming for a while people getting mad when they have her on the ropes then she shotguns a ult and haha. It's meant to be a long ranged thing
then its not really an ultimate, is it?

Now it's a balanced ultimate. Dealing 225 + 0.5 at NO RANGE, aka an AUTOMATIC HIT, PLUS the insane execute damage was ridiculously strong. The ability was never meant to be a point blank nuke, and now it isn't. God forbid, jinx players will actually need to put some brain power into using their ults, as now a brain-dead no ranged R press won't deal the extra 400 physical damage. It'll still execute; it just won't completely annihilate.
she will still be plenty strong if you know how to play her
Anybody notice that Mundo has Caitlyns Dp?

No, this jinx nerf is not a good idea, yes it was never meant to be a shotgun, but now, with such a large nerf to point blank damage, no melee assassin with a dive ability (zed, talon, akali, diana..)needs to fear her anymore, the moment they get on her, unless summoners are up, or she is insanely more fed then them, its a guaranteed kill hands down (short of actually having teammates who can peel, which lets face it, not very likely in lower ranked tiers). You have now taken a ramp up champion (Q passive) and turned her into a champ that is never going to want to be anywhere near a fight for fear of getting 100-0 when defensive summoners are down. Now don't get me wrong, I think a nerf to it is needed, because yes, it isn't meant to be a point blank ability, but those numbers, that's not a nerf, that's death to ever using the ability unless you are attempting a mid-long range snipe, so if this ability is going to stand at having such a massive damage reduction at close range, then this needs to be done to the other global ultimates too, like Ashe's and Ezreal's. Because as far as I understand, the only range reduction to Ashe's ult isn't damage, its stun duration. And Ez's is only reduced by how many champs it passes through?

She's a marksman, the whole point is that assassins will be able to counter her. There are still ways to defend against being jumped on (her E), but a panicked ult won't save you anymore. And it does still deal bonus damage for their missing HP, so it's not a total loss.

Why the hell is Dr Mundo's icon a picture of Caitlyn?
Mundo x Caitlyn? :O
finally a new {{champion:126}} skin :) The Ravenhawke approves {{summoner:31}}
Mark/Dash is OP as fk. Needs a nerf/removal
This.

A true damage poke with giant range, only 20sec cooldown AND you can free flash to the target it hits.....
Broken as hell. So much for aram.
too much for me too take in
What's the point of changing the spell from the Poro King event???
If you read the patch note you'll see their adding it as a summoner spell option exclusively to the howling abyss.

Hmm not sure about the change to {{item:3071}} the extra health and cool-down is going to be great as the extra stacks. I see some tough decisions were made. I do like the change to {{item:3153}} and {{item:3085}}. It's going to make fighting tanks much less of a pain. {{champion:103}}'s charm now makes sense. thank you. so many times getting hit with that thing when ulting as {{champion:254}} and left scratching my head on how I got charmed. Nice patch all and all. can't wait for the new skins and visual updates to come in.

btw, is there gonna be 
- 3v3 ranked team
- oce skin
- ao shin
- tribunal (idk if there is one)

any time soon ? lol
OCE skin? 3V3 ranked team? Let me just ask, when?
new mundo skin upcoming. "definitely not caitlyn"

Ok rito, you have a bug. 1 out of 2 games, I lag out at the end of the game, right when the nexus blows up, and sometimes it doesn't say I'm a leaver, but they always contribute to the low priority queue count. please find a good way to tell whether or not the "leaver" is actually someone who has a bad internet- like me. I am now at the start of a new 'punishment' for 5 games for 20 minutes. I'm not asking you to get rid of my 'punishment', but to fix this problem. punish the right people please as we all know how annoying actual leavers are.
Hey  yeah so when will  {{champion:22}} s Q be changed coz I thought it would be changed on this patch everything is still the same
Ahh. Dr Mundo Icon is Cait? {{champion:51}}
{{item:3085}}  Death the Kid Approves

I purpose a buff to Quinn in which she can choose where she lands when casting Skystrike.  This will allow her to become more of an assassin as opposed to an adc.  A lot of AD assassins can get in and kill priority targets and get out (zed, talon, kha'zix, etc), where as I find trying to play Quinn as an assassin makes it awkward because you can get in and get the kill but you can't escape and just end up trading kills.  This would allow a lot more juke potential as well.

Why did you make Blood Moon {{champion:26}}, you had the perfect blood moon team, {{champion:98}} top, {{champion:60}} jng, {{champion:84}} mid, {{champion:412}} support and {{champion:429}} adc. {{item:3070}} Y U DO THIS.
Riot can you please add a new skin to {{champion:238}}

Riot i was playing sion and i killed the wolves camp but i didnt get 10 health from the large monster i didnt get anything at all so if your reading this plz try to change it because i checked again when i was fighting the camp that used to be the wraith camp(i forgot what its called) and i checked i didnt get 10 health from large monster and i had my w upgraded 3 times when i checked this so its definitely a glitch that i wish you guys would fix because that 10 health can change your health from the start of the game to the end by about 200 cause im pretty sure it also doesnt work with assists and kills
